org.springframework.data.keyvalue.core

类 QueryEngine<ADAPTER extends KeyValueAdapter,CRITERIA,SORT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.data.keyvalue.core.QueryEngine<ADAPTER,CRITERIA,SORT>
  • 类型参数:
    ADAPTER -
    CRITERIA -
    SORT - 

    public abstract class QueryEngine<ADAPTER extends KeyValueAdapter,CRITERIA,SORT>
extends Object
    Base implementation for accessing and executing KeyValueQuery against a KeyValueAdapter.

    • 构造器概要
